external_games.name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 1 DLC

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 1
summary: INCEPTION Part 1 is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. We have taken the levels from the original Hacker Evolution game and remastered them for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine. Experience an entirely new game through this DLC as you hack your way through 10 levels.
